name: B.U.G Warfare
description:
Welcome Recruit!

Are you ready for B.U.G Warfare? 

Find out now in this Tower Defense game for the GitHub Game Off 2021, with the theme of bugs.

In B.U.G Warfare you'll face 20 days of wave after wave of bugs as they try to devour your prized peonies. As part of the gnome resistance, your job is co-ordinate the gnome forces to survive this onslaught, whilst making profit selling flowers on the side.

Do you have what it takes?

---------------------------

This was my first game/jam and it was tonnes of fun to make!

If you'd like to see more, or have any feedback, please leave a comment here!

Source code and license attrubitions can be found at : https://github.com/hxpmods/B.U.G

B.U.G Warfare was made with the Godot Engine.
